element-type.name: button
element-type.description: A link that supports invocation of an action with control over conversation propagation. <i>Does not submit the form.</i>

attribute-type.name: actionListener
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding pointing at method accepting an ActionEvent with return type void

attribute-type.name: title
attribute-type.description: Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: dir
attribute-type.description: Direction indication for text that does not inherit directionality. Valid values are "LTR" (left-to-right) and "RTL" (right-to-left)

attribute-type.name: styleClass
attribute-type.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute

attribute-type.name: pageflow
attribute-type.description: a pageflow definition to begin. (This is only useful when propagation="begin" or propagation="join".)

attribute-type.name: outcome
attribute-type.description: ${prop.xmlEncodedDescription}

attribute-type.name: accesskey
attribute-type.description: This attribute assigns an access key to an element. An access key is a single character from the document character set. Note: Authors should consider the input method of the expected reader when specifying an accesskey

attribute-type.name: fragment
attribute-type.description: the fragment identifier to link to.

attribute-type.name: onkeypress
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed and released

attribute-type.name: ondblclick
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is double-clicked

attribute-type.name: image
attribute-type.description: image

attribute-type.name: propagation
attribute-type.description: determines the conversation propagation style: begin, join, nest, none or end.

attribute-type.name: style
attribute-type.description: CSS style(s) is/are to be applied when this component is rendered

attribute-type.name: size
attribute-type.description: This attribute tells the user agent the initial width of the control. The width is given in pixels except when type attribute has the value "text" or "password". In that case, its value refers to the (integer) number of characters

attribute-type.name: onmouseover
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved onto

attribute-type.name: view
attribute-type.description: the JSF view id to link to.

attribute-type.name: action
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding pointing at the application action to be invoked, if this UIComponent is activated by the user, during the Apply Request Values or Invoke Application phase of the request processing lifecycle, depending on the value of the immediate property

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: The current value for this component

attribute-type.name: onkeyup
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is released

attribute-type.name: tabindex
attribute-type.description: This attribute specifies the position of the current element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be a number between 0 and 32767. User agents should ignore leading zeros

attribute-type.name: converter
attribute-type.description: Id of Converter to be used or reference to a Converter

attribute-type.name: type
attribute-type.description: submit|reset|image|button This attribute specifies a type of control to create. The default value for this attribute is "submit"

attribute-type.name: lang
attribute-type.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component

attribute-type.name: actionExpression
attribute-type.description: actionExpression

attribute-type.name: disabled
attribute-type.description: When set for a form control, this boolean attribute disables the control for user input

attribute-type.name: onclick
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is clicked

attribute-type.name: alt
attribute-type.description: For a user agents that cannot display images, forms, or applets, this attribute specifies alternate text. The language of the alternate text is specified by the lang attribute

attribute-type.name: onmouseout
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved away

attribute-type.name: onkeydown
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed down

attribute-type.name: onmousedown
attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is pressed down

attribute-type.name: taskInstance
attribute-type.description: Specify the task to operate on (e.g. for @StartTask)

attribute-type.name: immediate
attribute-type.description: True means, that the default ActionListener should be executed immediately (i.e. during Apply Request Values phase of the request processing lifecycle), rather than waiting until the Invoke Application phase

attribute-type.name: onmouseup
attribute-type.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button is released

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: onmousemove
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved within

element-type.name: cache
element-type.description: Cache the rendered page fragment using JBoss Cache. Note that <s:cache> actually uses the instance of JBoss Cache managed by the built-in pojoCache component.

attribute-type.name: key
attribute-type.description: the key to cache rendered content, often a value expression. For example, if we were caching a page fragment that displays a document, we might use key="Document-#{document.id}".

attribute-type.name: enabled
attribute-type.description: a value expression that determines if the cache should be used.

attribute-type.name: region
attribute-type.description: a JBoss Cache node to use (different nodes can have different expiry policies).

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: If "false", this component is not rendered

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

element-type.name: conversationId
element-type.description: Add the conversation id to an output link (or similar JSF control).

attribute-type.description: value

attribute-type.description: A value reference pointing at a javax.faces.model.SelectItem instance

attribute-type.name: itemEscaped
attribute-type.description: itemEscaped

attribute-type.name: itemDescription
attribute-type.description: A description used by tools only

attribute-type.name: label
attribute-type.description: the label to be used when rendering the SelectItem.

attribute-type.name: itemLabel
attribute-type.description: A text shown by the item

attribute-type.name: itemDisabled
attribute-type.description: If "true", this component isn't saved during state saving

attribute-type.description: The attribute takes a value-binding expression for a component property of a backing bean

attribute-type.name: itemValue
attribute-type.description: Item value, which is passed to the server as a request parameter

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.description: this value binding receives the file size (optional).

attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.name: size
attribute-type.description: This attribute tells the user agent the initial width of the control. The width is given in pixels except when type attribute has the value "text" or "password". In that case, its value refers to the (integer) number of characters

attribute-type.name: accept
attribute-type.description: a comma-separated list of content types to accept, may not be supported by the browser. E.g. "images/png,images/jpg", "images/*".

attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved onto

attribute-type.description: This attribute specifies the position of the current element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be a number between 0 and 32767. User agents should ignore leading zeros

attribute-type.name: maxlength
attribute-type.description: When the type attribute has the value "text" or "password", this attribute specifies the maximum number of characters the user may enter. This number may exceed the specified size, in which case the user agent should offer a scrolling mechanism. The default value for this attribute is an unlimited number

attribute-type.description: When set for a form control, this boolean attribute disables the control for user input

attribute-type.name: align
attribute-type.description:
left|center|right|justify [CI] Deprecated. This attribute specifies the horizontal alignment of its element with respect to the surrounding context. Possible values:
* left: text lines are rendered flush left. * center: text lines are centered. * right: text lines are rendered flush right. * justify: text lines are justified to both margins.
The default depends on the base text direction. For left to right text, the default is align=left, while for right to left text, the default is align=right

attribute-type.description: Direction indication for text that does not inherit directionality. Valid values are "LTR" (left-to-right) and "RTL" (right-to-left)

attribute-type.description: Every component may have a unique id that is automatically created if omitted

attribute-type.description: A reverse link from the anchor specified by this hyperlink to the current document. The value of this attribute is a space-separated list of link types

attribute-type.name: pageflow

attribute-type.description: CSS style(s) is/are to be applied when this component is rendered

attribute-type.description: determines the conversation propagation style: begin, join, nest, none or end.

attribute-type.description: Specify the task to operate on (e.g. for @StartTask)

attribute-type.name: onmousemove
attribute-type.description: HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved within

attribute-type.name: coords
attribute-type.description:
This attribute specifies the position and shape on the screen. The number and order of values depends on the shape being defined. Possible combinations:
* rect: left-x, top-y, right-x, bottom-y. * circle: center-x, center-y, radius. Note. When the radius value is percentage value, user agents should calculate the final radius value based on the associated object's width and height. The radius should be the smaller value of the two. * poly: x1, y1, x2, y2, ..., xN, yN. The first x and y coordinate pair and the last should be the same to close the polygon. When these coordinate values are not the same, user agents should infer an additional coordinate pair to close the polygon.
Coordinates are relative to the top, left corner of the object. All values are lengths. All values are separated by commas

attribute-type.name: actionListener
attribute-type.description: MethodBinding pointing at method accepting an ActionEvent with return type void

attribute-type.name: title
attribute-type.description: Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component

attribute-type.name: shape
attribute-type.description:
default|rect|circle|poly [CI] This attribute specifies the shape of a region. Possible values:
* default: Specifies the entire region. * rect: Define a rectangular region. * circle: Define a circular region. * poly: Define a polygonal region.

attribute-type.name: target
attribute-type.description:
This attribute specifies the name of a frame where a document is to be opened.
By assigning a name to a frame via the name attribute, authors can refer to it as the "target" of links defined by other elements

element-type.name: selectItems
element-type.description: Creates a List<SelectItem> from a List, Set, DataModel or Array.

attribute-type.name: var
attribute-type.description: defines the name of the local variable that holds the current object during iteration

attribute-type.name: value
attribute-type.description: value

attribute-type.name: label
attribute-type.description: the label to be used when rendering the SelectItem. Can reference the var variable

attribute-type.name: disabled
attribute-type.description: if true the SelectItem will be rendered disabled. Can reference the var variable

attribute-type.name: hideNoSelectionLabel
attribute-type.description: if true, the noSelectionLabel will be hidden when a value is selected

attribute-type.name: noSelectionLabel
attribute-type.description: specifies the (optional) label to place at the top of list (if required="true" is also specified then selecting this value will cause a validation error)
